name: (EXP) EMP
content:
EMPs don't inflict any damage, but instead discharge an electromagnetic burst that disrupts electronics.

When detonated, all technology that employs a cell suffers stop functioning for 1d4 minutes. Vehicles suffer disadvantage on Dexterity checks for 1d4 minutes.

@Compendium[compendiums-mix-dnd5e.um5-rules.WklldBUUO3oesibI]{UM5 Ch.6: Granades & Explosives} @Compendium[compendiums-mix-dnd5e.um5-weaponproperties.a6bTH9RIOA1gwoza]{Grenade}  @Compendium[compendiums-mix-dnd5e.um5-weaponproperties.tyqnHVNxWuUF1jDk]{EXP (Explosives)}
